review: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS DEVISE IF YOU DON'T HAVE A NEW TELEVISION.  Buried somewhere in the use agreement is a statement that the devise will not work with televisions that don't have a chip that blocks unlimited recording of downloaded items.  Additionally, when the Fire Stick is first purchased, it works perfectly.  Only after months of use does the user learn that the older (two or three years old) television is not compatible.  I spend thousands of dollars annually on Amazon, and due to this blatant misrepresentation, it will now be tens.of dollars or less.

review: Sir/Ma'am,I've lost track of how many times this device has frozen in the middle of a show, forcing me to pull the plug to reset.The most recent issue is that after freezing while watching something it is telling me that "home is currently unavailable" and to check my network settings if I hit the home button (thinking it may have been an issue with Hulu or Netflix, and not the firestick). Done.  It shows a strong network connection.  Still no home screen available. Other network devices are functioning as normal.  Even my 8 yr old laptop that survived 16 months in Baghdad can still boot and stream without freezing...  It's not the providers or my network. The only issue is with the firestick.  Unplugging it and plugging it back in is getting old...but it works again.  We shouldn't have to do this every day.
author: eternalgreenknight "Chris"
